description: Collects the latest Windows Security, Defender, and optional Sysmon events from the past specified hours. Produces NDJSON output summarizing event counts and providing detailed per-event entries. Uses atomic logging with fallback handling.

script_parameters.name: HoursBack
script_parameters.description: Number of hours back from the current time to collect events.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
